mapper.insert: insert into diet(emailAddress, menu, calorie, eatTime) values(#{emailAddress},#{menu},#{calorie},#{eatTime})
mapper.select: select emailAddress, menu, calorie, eatTime from diet Where emailAddress=#{emailAddress}
mapper.update: update diet set emailAddress=#{emailAddress}, menu=#{menu}, calorie=#{calorie}, eatTime=#{eatTime} where emailAddress = #{emailAddress}
mapper.select: select emailAddress, menu, calorie, eatTime from diet where emailAddress> 0 order by emailAddress desc
